product_name: Merrell Enlighten Eluma Breeze Shoes - Women's
long_description: Athletic attitude merges with street smarts in the sporty, stylish Merrell Enlighten Eluma Breeze Shoes for women. Breathable mesh keeps you cool while you cruise in comfort thanks to responsive M Select MOVE footbeds that allow natural flexibility, stability and cushioning in every step. Merrell air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. Compression molded EVA footframe provides stability and comfort. Molded nylon arch shanks offer additional stability. Merrell Enlighten Eluma Breeze Shoes are treated with the M Select Fresh antimicrobial finish to help resist odors. M Select Grip traction outsoles stick to wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: Athletic attitude merges with street smarts in the sporty, stylish Merrell Enlighten Eluma Breeze Shoes for women.
